getUserDetails

Overview

This call is used to fetch the user details of a given sid. Returned data includes the personal, agency and work information.

BSGv3 BSGv2 Show Additional Data Elements
No Yes

Request

  • The headers must include a valid authentication token.
Parameter Description Required
uid User ID Yes
sid Session ID Yes
op Operation Yes
Test URL MSG Agent -MSGSIT:
http://msgsit.rpdata.com/ttsvr/msgdebug?op=getUserDetails&uid=TWISTUSER001&sid=404-b9cae2209ddfbdf992e0ad54558716f3

Response

Success: { "response": { "status": "success" } }

Error: { "response": { "status": "error", "description": "error.invalid.sessiontoken", "message": "You cannot be authenticated. You have recently either logged in on a different device, or changed your password. Please login again." } }
